allow: Bash(for pkg in medfit mediationverse medrobust medsim probmed)
Bash(# Check if there''s a done() function autoloaded ls -la ~/.config/zsh/functions/done || echo ""No done autoload file"" # Check all function files ls ~/.config/zsh/functions/)

Bash(xxd echo "" echo "=== Lines 28-36 ===" sed -n '28,36p' ~/.config/zsh/functions/adhd-helpers.zsh echo "" echo "=== Check for any done definition in zsh startup ===" grep -r "^done\(\)\|^function done\|alias done" ~/.zshrc ~/.zshenv ~/.zprofile ~/.config/zsh/*.zsh)
Bash(echo "None found in standard locations" echo "" echo "=== Check fpath for done ===" for d in /usr/share/zsh/*/functions /usr/local/share/zsh/*/functions ~/.config/zsh/functions)
Bash(tail -5 echo "" echo "=== Check what sources adhd-helpers ===" grep -l "adhd-helpers" ~/.zshrc ~/.config/zsh/*.zsh)

Bash(# Check for ANY zwc files echo ""=== All .zwc files in zsh config ==="" find ~/.config/zsh -name ""*.zwc"" echo """" echo ""=== Check if done is defined as a function in any sourced file ==="" grep -rn ""^done\s*()\|^done()\|function done"" ~/.config/zsh/)

Bash(# Check the order of sourcing in .zshrc echo ""=== Lines around adhd-helpers source in .zshrc ==="" grep -n -B5 -A2 ""adhd-helpers"" ~/.config/zsh/.zshrc echo """" echo ""=== Check for done() anywhere before line 751 ==="" head -751 ~/.config/zsh/.zshrc)
Bash(head -10 echo "" echo "=== Check all files that might be sourced ===" grep -n "^source\|^\.\s" ~/.config/zsh/.zshrc)
Bash(# Check claude-workflows.zsh for done echo ""=== Check claude-workflows.zsh for done ==="" grep -n ""done\s*()\|done()\|function done"" ~/.config/zsh/functions/claude-workflows.zsh)
Bash(head -20 echo "" echo "=== Look for done in any plugin ===" grep -rn "^done()\|^function done\|^done \(\)" ~/.cache/antidote)

Bash(# Binary search to find the culprit in zshrc echo ""=== Binary search for culprit in zshrc ==="" # Test first 375 lines head -375 ~/.config/zsh/.zshrc zsh -i -c ''source /tmp/test1.zsh 2>/dev/null; source ~/.config/zsh/functions/adhd-helpers.zsh && echo ""First 375: OK""'' 2>&1)
Bash(# Just search config files - NO interactive shells echo ""=== Searching for ''done'' function definition in all zsh config ==="" grep -rn ""^done()\|^done ()\|function done"" ~/.config/zsh/)
Bash(# Check work.zsh and claude-workflows.zsh for done definition echo ""=== Check work.zsh ==="" grep -n ""^done\|function done"" ~/.config/zsh/functions/work.zsh)
Bash(head -5 echo "" echo "=== List all function files ===" ls -la ~/.config/zsh/functions/*.zsh)
Bash(# Check antidote bundle for done function echo ""=== Search antidote cache for done function ==="" grep -rn ""^done()\|^function done\|^done ()"" ~/.cache/antidote/)
Bash(# Check p10k instant prompt for done echo ""=== Check p10k instant prompt ==="" grep -n ""^done\|function done"" ~/.cache/p10k-instant-prompt-*.zsh)

Bash(# Deep search for ANY definition of ''done'' as function/alias echo ""=== Search EVERYWHERE for done function ==="" # Check antidote cache echo ""Antidote cache:"" find ~/.cache/antidote -type f -name ""*.zsh"" -exec grep -l ""^done()\|^function done\|alias done="" {} \;)
Bash(# Check what''s in those backup files echo ""=== Check .zshrc.tmp ==="" grep -n ""^done()\|^function done\|alias done="" ~/.config/zsh/.zshrc.tmp)
Bash(head -5 echo "" echo "=== Check .zshrc.bak2 ===" grep -n "^done()\|^function done\|alias done=" ~/.config/zsh/.zshrc.bak2)
Bash(head -5 echo "" echo "=== Are any of these being sourced? ===" grep -r "\.zshrc\.bak\|\.zshrc\.tmp" ~/.config/zsh/.zshrc)
Bash(head -10 echo "" echo "=== Check if there''s a zsh alias file ===" ls -la ~/.config/zsh/*.alias* ~/.config/zsh/aliases*)
Bash(# Check the compiled antidote plugin file echo ""=== Check .zsh_plugins.zsh for done ==="" grep -n ""alias done\|^done()\|function done"" ~/.config/zsh/.zsh_plugins.zsh)
Bash(zsh -c 'source ~/.config/zsh/.zshrc && type r qu cc gm focus note obs workflow')
Bash(zsh -c 'source ~/.config/zsh/functions/smart-dispatchers.zsh && type r qu cc gm focus note obs workflow')
Bash(for f in cc r qu gm focus note obs workflow work)
